mapper.sql: id, node_id, model_id, type, network_type, network_param, min_num, max_num, item_num, extend_bl, remark, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select id, case when type = 0 then CONCAT('带宽:',network_type) else CONCAT('流量:',network_type) end as config from t_node_network where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select nn.id, nn.node_id, nn.model_id, nn.type, nn.network_type, nn.network_param, nn.min_num, nn.max_num, nn.item_num, nn.extend_bl, nn.remark, nn.status, nn.create_time, nn.update_time,IFNULL(np.item,0.0)as item,IFNULL(np.price,0.0)as price from t_node_network as nn left join t_node_price as np on np.node_id = nn.node_id and np.period = 1 and np.config_id = nn.id and np.config_type = 'network' where nn.node_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_node_network (node_id, model_id, type, network_type, network_param, min_num, max_num, item_num, extend_bl, remark, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{networkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{networkParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extendBl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_node_network
node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
network_type = #{networkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
network_param = #{networkParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_num = #{minNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
max_num = #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
item_num = #{itemNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
extend_bl = #{extendBl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_node_network set node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, network_type = #{networkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network_param = #{networkParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_num = #{minNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, max_num = #{maxNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, item_num = #{itemNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, extend_bl = #{extendBl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
